column4: Hi Guys I'm having problems with my USB the Os on my HP Desktop machine I'm running off is not picking up the USB
What sahll I do, do I have to install any software for the OS to pick up the USB
*Shall
are you sure USB booting is suppported?
How do you mean, when I boot up the Computer
go into the bios and see if USB is offered as a boot option.
Righto, I shall do that for you now and I will be right back right now
Yeah, It's showing on the boot menu
OK, select USB, SAVE THE OPTION, exit and reboot...
Done that for you
did it boot?
Yes It boot, then went into the OS
success?
What you mean success?, the OS isn't picking my USB up though
maybe I misunderstood.  I thought you had an ubuntu USB and it wouldn't boot?
No Ubuntu is running off my Hard Drive, not my USB
awkward.  I apologize.  Totally misunderstood.  So it does not see the USB
does the USB run on other computers?
Yes. I know that, and don't worry it's fine and yes, that's right the OS Isn't picking it up
Yes It does?
do you use this usb in a Mac/Apple?
Windows 7
LOL.  ok
